pkgmetadata.longdescription: [tool.poetry]name = "ringgpt"version = "0.2.0"description = "Package enables users to iterate on a corpus to perform single shot completion tasks leveraging GPT-3.5, Bard and Bing Chat"authors = ["Avinaash Anand K <avinaash96@gmail.com>"]license = "Apache-2.0"readme = "README.md"[tool.poetry.dependencies]python = "^3.9"pandas = "^2.0.2"GoogleBard = "^1.0.3"asyncio = "^3.4.3"EdgeGPT = "0.5.0"revChatGPT = "^5.0.3"requests = "^2.31.0"rich = "^13.4.2"langchain = "^0.0.203"tiktoken = "^0.4.0"[build-system]requires = ["poetry-core"]build-backend = "poetry.core.masonry.api"
